```{r}
heavy_30m <- power(m = 31725, v = 30, a = 9)
heavy_30m

### need to change to km/hr instead of m/s

heavy_40km <- power(m = 31725, v = (40*3.6), a = 9) # *3.6 converts km to m

heavy_80km <- power(m = 31725, v = (80*3.6), a = 9)
heavy_80km

heavy_120km
```
